ADS.Text1: After entering the game, when approaching the baby, the door, the refrigerator, and some other items, you will see a hint icon appear as shown below.
ADS.Text2: Click it directly to perform the action. Look up in the upper left corner and there you will know what the current quest requirement is. Or you can select the icon in the lower-left corner to perform the operation.
ADS.Text3: The simple tasks are to get milk to change diapers and put the baby to sleep, if you need milk, go to the room at the bottom of the stairs. Open the refrigerator and you will see milk.
ADS.Text4: Upstairs, there will be the last room and the room at the top of the stairs is open. The last room will be where you let your baby sleep.
ADS.Text5: The room at the top of the stairs you can open on the third day will contain an item called Talisma, which is used to counter the demon in the child.
ADS.Text6: Just do the tasks set out as required but there will be scares coming from the baby you watch. Accompanied by strange phenomena of horror nature that you will have to face.
ADS.Text7: Try to do all the tasks and you will “break” the game.
ADS.Text8: Rate Us 5 Stars And Download The Baby In Yellоw 2 and Now get Baby In yellow tips on your device.
